price: "Por certo, antes, nós O invocávamos. Por certo, Ele é O Blandicioso, O Misericordiador."
arabic: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبۡلُ نَدۡعُوهُۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: innā kunnā min qablu nadʿūhu innahu huwa al-baru al-raḥīmu
